Context:
Sheida Richardson is a graduate of George Brown College who was in a retail store working and unsure about her future in 2006. She began feeling unsettled and started investigating educational options around a year into her educational hiatus. The college provided her with the right direction to pursue her education. Sheida has since used her George Brown College education to escape an abusive relationship and became a leading advocate for victims of violence across the GTA and beyond.

Contact Information:

- TTY number: 1-877-515-5559
- Email address: ask.george@georgebrown.ca

Application Deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours and more can be received by signing up on the website. The information in the website is subject to change without notice and students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.

The text also mentions a "Learning to Heal" page, but no further information about it is provided.

There is no explicit mention of specific programs offered by the college in the text.
